title: What's the weather like in your country? Describe the four seasons.

korean: 봄에는 날씨가 따뜻해지고 꽃들이 피기 시작해.
특히 벚꽃 시즌엔 정말 예쁜데, 황사나 미세먼지가 좀 심한 게 단점이야.
여름은 덥고 습해서 견디기 힘들 때가 많아.
장마철엔 비도 많이 오고, 태풍도 가끔 와.
에어컨 없이는 살 수 없을 정도로 무더워.
날씨가 선선하고 하늘도 높고 맑아서 활동하기 좋아.
단풍도 예쁘고, 여행 가기 딱 좋은 시기지.
겨울엔 꽤 추운 편이라 두꺼운 옷 입어야 해.
눈이 오면 예쁘긴 한데, 출퇴근이 힘들어져.
최근 몇 년은 날씨가 예전보다 더 극단적으로 변한 것 같아.
english: Korea has, like, really distinct four seasons.
In spring, the weather gets warmer and flowers start blooming.
Especially during cherry blossom season, it's really pretty, but the downside is yellow dust and fine dust can be severe.
Summer is hot and humid, so it's, you know, often hard to bear.
During the rainy season, it rains a lot, and typhoons occasionally come.
It's so hot that you can't live without air conditioning.
Fall is, like, personally my favorite season.
The weather is cool and the sky is high and clear, so it's good for activities.
The autumn leaves are pretty too, and it's, you know, the perfect time to travel.
In winter, it's quite cold, so you have to wear thick clothes.
When it snows, it's pretty, but commuting becomes difficult.
In recent years, the weather seems to have, like, changed more extremely than before.
